summary:
Michael Scott - huge Phillie and ships phan... not quiet about it and makes lots of sexual jokes about phan.
Dwight Schrute -...
body:
Michael Scott - huge Phillie and ships phan… not quiet about it and makes lots of sexual jokes about phan.

Dwight Schrute - appreciates Phil’s love of houseplants. Ships Dan and Phil but will kill you if you say anything about it.

Angela Martin - disgusted by the idea of Dan and Phil being a couple. Secretly loves Dan but does not like his use of bad language.

Pam Beesly - HUGE phannie, thinks they’re both adorable.

Jim Halpert - watches Dan and Phil because Pam loves them, casual fan of both.

Andy Bernard - big Dannie and is NOT quiet about it.

Kelly Kapoor - introduced everyone to Dan and Phil, huge phannie but likes Dan more than Phil.

Meredith Palmer - wants to fuck both of them

Ryan Howard - pretends to hate them because he wants to piss Kelly off. Loves Phil though.

Creed Bratton - confused as to what’s going on but likes them

Kevin Malone - thinks it’s obvious Dan and Phil are dating. Loves both of them

Stanley Hudson - wouldn’t be caught dead watching dan and phil. Hates them.

Toby Flenderson - big ass phillie

Phyllis Vance - thinks Phil is handsome and very sweet also loves Dan.

Darryl Philbin - definitely a phillie

Erin Hannon - BIG DANNIE but totally ships it

Holly Flax - also a huge Phillie but an even bigger Dannie (don’t tell Michael though)

Jan Levinson - one of those gross Dannies

Oscar Martinez - phannie for sure. Loves their relationship and both of them equally.

summary: 😂 😂 😂 Playing the Sims 4 and @danielhowell 's sim has complete nonchalance towards the fact that the chair near to him is on...
body:
😂 😂 😂 Playing the Sims 4 and @danielhowell ’s sim has complete nonchalance towards the fact that the chair near to him is on fire or the fact that it was burning while @amazingphil ’s sim was sitting in it lmao

Sometimes, I think his sim is way too alike to the real Dan lol

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary:
Y’all: DAN AND PHIL WENT UP NORTH TO GET MARRIED.
Me: they probably went to visit some friends.
Y’all: MARRIAGE. SWEET GAY...
body:
Y’all: DAN AND PHIL WENT UP NORTH TO GET MARRIED.


Me: they probably went to visit some friends.


Y’all: MARRIAGE. SWEET GAY MARRIAGe.


Phil: hey look at this dog. Remember my friend? The one With the dog? I’m with my friends dog. At my friends house, whom I came to visit. With his dog.
